actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend and make certain technical and conforming changes in section 5008 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to distilled spirits.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to abatement, remission, refund, and allowance for loss or destruction of distilled spirits shipped from Puerto Rico or the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to amend and make certain technical and conforming changes in section 5008 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to distilled spirits.
